meanings.sent1: The gull flew gracefully over the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a gull perched on the dock by the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gull stole a fry from my plate!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like the cry of a gull in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The white gull's wings glinted in the sunlight as it soared.

meanings.sent1: He tried to gull his friends into believing his tall tale.
meanings.sent2: The con artist attempted to gull unsuspecting tourists.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to gull the audience with his sleight of hand.
meanings.sent4: She managed to gull her way out of trouble with a clever excuse.
meanings.sent5: The scammer's smooth talk was meant to gull people into giving him money.
